concept.title: High availability and disaster recovery
concept.shortdesc: Couchbase Server supports a range of high availability and disaster recovery (HA/DR) strategies depending on an organizationâ€™s needs, standard operating procedures, and budget.

conbody.p: Although Couchbase Server supports true zero downtime deployments, often less stringent downtime objectives can be supported more economically and without serious impact to business continuity for mission critical applications. The exact tools and configurations to use depend on an organization's recovery point objectives (RPO = how much data can be lost in case of failure?) and recovery time objectives (RTO = how long does the technical team have to restore the system and the data?). Most HA/DR strategies rely on a multi-pronged approach of maximizing availability, increasing redundancy within and across data centers, and performing regular backups.
